sources.title: Secrets of an Actress
sources.description: Title: Secrets of an Actress Summary: Two architects lose their heads over a glamorous actress. Directed by: William Keighley Actors: Kay Francis, George Brent, Ian Hunter Production Company: Warner Bros. Release Date: 10 September 1938 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Two architects lose their heads over a glamorous actress.

metadata.Plot: Two architects lose their heads over a glamorous actress.
metadata.Writer: Milton Krims, Rowland Leigh, Julius J. Epstein
